Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] How to learn a language
References: <374A8ED0.F7471852@...> <374B0639.5442B615@...> <374DB2DB.E6FEDB0B@...> <003301bea926$058f95a0$490dfea9@ashley>

Ashley Dunn wrote:

> From: "Ashley Dunn" <asdunn1@...>
>
> Tom, how do you improve a language without learning from someone who is
> excellent? In other words, how would two average speakers of Old Erudian
> work their language skill up? Someone told me that we should group, spam
> each other, get two improves, then zone. Then repeat until you faint. Is
> this correct?
>


That The trick .. About an Hour should do it with Quick zone times



--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"But I've always been a Loner by Nature
and A Lurker by Want"

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
